name: Minimalist Wikipedia Widescreen
description: Adapted from style 22809 by user 27086, this style is best suited for displays more than 1280px wide.
css:
@-moz-document 
domain(wikibooks.org),
domain(wikipedia.org),
domain(wikiquote.org),
domain(wikisource.org),
domain(wikiversity.org),
domain(wiktionary.org),
domain(commons.wikimedia.org),
domain(meta.wikimedia.org),
domain(species.wikimedia.org){

a,a:link,#mw-normal-catlinks a,#footer a{background-color:transparent !important;color:#003399 !important;text-decoration:none !important;}a:visited,#mw-normal-catlinks a:visited{color:#660099 !important;}a.new, a.new:visited {color:#dd0000 !important;}blockquote{color:#555555 !important;font-size:13px !important;}blockquote.toccolours{border:none !important;margin:1em !important;width:auto !important;}body{background:none !important;width:95%!important;max-width:1320px !important;margin: 0 auto !important;}#mw-page-base{width: 0px!important;height: 0em !important;background-color: white !important;background-image: none !important;}#mw-head-base {width: 0px!important;margin-top: 0em !important;margin-left: 0em !important;height: 5em !important;background-image: none !important;}#mw-head {width: 90% !important;margin: 0px 5% 0px 5% !important;padding: 0px !important;padding-top: 25px !important;background-image: none !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #999999 !important;}#mw-head h5 {margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}#mw-head #p-personal{position:absolute !important;top: 16px !important;right: 0px !important;left: auto !important;z-index: 5 !important;}#mw-head #p-personal h5{display: block !important;text-transform: lowercase !important;font-size: 11.5px !important;}#mw-head #p-personal ul {background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;border: 1px solid #aaaaaa !important;padding:5px 10px 5px 10px !important;display: block !important;list-style-type: none !important;position: absolute !important;top: .8em !important;right: 0 !important;display: none !important;}#mw-head #p-personal:hover ul, #mw-head #p-personal ul:hover{display: block !important;}#mw-head #p-personal ul li {margin-left:0 !important;display: block !important;float: none !important;line-height: 1em !important;white-space: nowrap !important;}#pt-userpage,#pt-anonuserpage,#pt-login {background: none !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}#left-navigation {position: relative !important;float: left !important;left: 0 !important;top: auto !important;padding-left: 5em !important;margin-top: 2.5em !important;}#right-navigation {float: right !important;margin-top: 2.5em !important;}div.vectorTabs {float: left !important;border: none !important;background-image: none !important;padding: 0px !important;padding-left: 1px !important;border: none !important;margin-right: 15px !important;height: 1em !important;}div.vectorTabs ul {float: none !important;height: 1em !important;list-style: none !important;margin: 0 !important;padding: 0px !important;background-color: transparent !important;border: none !important;background-image: none !important;}div.vectorTabs ul li {float: none !important;height: 1em !important;display: inline-block !important;margin: 0 !important;padding: 0 !important;padding-bottom: 1px !important;background-color: transparent !important;background-image: none !important;border: none !important;}div.vectorTabs ul li.selected {margin-top: 3px !important;background-image: none !important;background-color: transparent !important;border-top: 1px solid #999999 !important;border-left: 1px solid #999999 !important;border-right: 1px solid #999999 !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #ffffff !important;}div.vectorTabs li:not(.icon) a {height: auto !important;text-transform: lowercase !important;background-color: transparent !important;background-image: none !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}div.vectorTabs li.icon{margin-top: -1px !important;padding-top: 0 !important;background-color: transparent !important;}div.vectorTabs li.icon a{height: 1em !important;margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}div.vectorTabs li.icon a span{display: none !important;}div.vectorTabs a span {padding-top: 0em !important;}div.vectorTabs a > span {float: none !important;display: block !important;background-color: transparent !important;}div.vectorTabs li.selected a > span {background-color: transparent !important;}div.vectorMenu {background-color: transparent !important;height: 1em !important;padding-top: 3px !important;}div.vectorMenu a{background-image: none !important;height: 1em !important;}div.vectorMenu div.menu {border: solid 0px #999999 !important;}div.vectorMenu div.menu ul {list-style-type: none !important;background-color: white !important;border: solid 1px #999999 !important;padding-top: 1px !important;}div.vectorMenu div.menu ul li.collapsible {list-style-type: none !important;}div.vectorMenu h5, div.vectorMenu h4 {background-image: none !important;border: none !important;padding-top: 3px !important;}div.vectorMenu h5 a, div.vectorMenu h4 a {height: 1em !important;background-image: none !important;border: none !important;}div.vectorMenu h5 a:hover, div.vectorMenu h4 a:hover {text-decoration: none !important;}#mw-head #p-search {float: right !important;position: relative !important;}table#searchInputResult{margin: 0 !important;font-size: 13px !important;}#p-search input {margin-top: 0em !important;}#searchform {margin-top: 0em !important;}#simpleSearch {margin-top: 0em !important;border: 1px solid #dddddd !important;height: 20px !important;}#searchButton, #searchInput {margin: 0em !important;}#simpleSearch label {top: 0.2em !important;}#simpleSearch input#searchInput {padding-top: 0em !important;}.suggestions {left: auto !important;right: 5.6% !important;}.suggestions[style*=\\\"width: 358px\\\"] {left: 12.5% !important;right: auto !important;}div#siteNotice{font-family: Georgia,serif !important;font-style: italic !important;font-size: .8em !important;}div.thumb div{font-size:11px !important;}h1.firstHeading {font-family: Georgia,serif !important;font-style: italic !important;border:none !important;font-size:24px !important;margin:0 !important;margin-top: 0px !important;padding:0 !important;background-image: none !important;}h1.firstHeading {margin-left: 320px !important;margin-top: -10px !important; margin-bottom: 15px !important;}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{font-family: Georgia,serif !important;font-style: italic !important;font-weight:normal !important;}#siteSub{display:none !important;}hr{display:none !important;}html,body,#globalWrapper{height:100% !important;}img{border:none !important;border-color:transparent !important;color:#dddddd !important;}li#pt-userpage,li#pt-anonuserpage,li#pt-login{padding-left:0 !important;}li.toclevel-2 ul{display:none !important;}pre{background-color:#f8f8f8 !important;border:none !important;}span.editsection{font:13px \\\"Segoe UI\\\",Tahoma,Verdana,sans-serif !important;}span.editsection a{padding:1px 3px !important;}table{}table ul,table ol,#disambig table{}table#toc ul,table ol,#disambig table{}table#toc ul {margin-top: 4px !important;font-size: 14.5px !important;}table#toc ul ul {margin-bottom: 0px !important;}table#toc li{margin:0 0 3px !important;}table#toc ul{list-style-type:none !important;}#toctitle{margin-bottom:1em !important;}table[align=\\\"right\\\"]{margin-left: 1em !important;}table[align=\\\"left\\\"]{margin-right: 1em !important;}table[style*=\\\"float: right\\\"]{margin-left: 1em !important;}table[style*=\\\"float: left\\\"]{margin-right: 1em !important;}table table{padding: 3px !important;}body:not(.ltr) #toctitle{text-align:right !important;}body.ltr #toctitle{text-align: left !important;}table.cquote{font-size:13px !important;margin:0 !important;}table.toccolours{background-color:#ffffff !important;border:20px solid !important;border-collapse:separate !important;margin:0px !important;-moz-border-bottom-colors:#ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-left-colors:#ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-right-colors:#ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-top-colors:#ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;padding:1em !important;}table.toccolours *{font-size:12px !important;font-weight:normal !important;}table.toccolours caption{display:none !important;}table.toccolours th,table.toccolours td{border:none !important;width:auto !important;}table.toccolours tr:first-child th,table.toccolours tr:first-child td{background:#ffffff !important;border-bottom:thick solid #dddddd !important;border-top:thick solid #dddddd !important;font-size:13px !important;text-align:center !important;}table.toccolours tr:not(:first-child) td:only-child[style*=\\\"background\\\"],table.toccolours tr:not(:first-child) td:only-child[style*=\\\"font-size:large\\\"],table.toccolours tr:not(:first-child) th[style*=\\\"background\\\"]:only-child,table.toccolours tr:not(:first-child) th[bgcolor]{background:#ffffff !important;border:none !important;border-bottom:1px solid #dddddd !important;font-size:12px !important;text-align:center !important;}table.toccolours[style*=\\\"float:right\\\"]{background:#ffffff !important;border-right:none !important;}table.toccolours[style*=\\\"margin\\\"][style*=\\\"auto\\\"],table.toccolours[style*=\\\"width:100%\\\"],table.toccolours[align=\\\"center\\\"]{clear:both !important;margin:15px 0 !important;width:100% !important;}table[style*=\\\"background-color:rgb(255,206,158)\\\"] td{margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}textarea{font:12px/1.6 Verdana,sans-serif !important;}ul{list-style-image:none !important;list-style-type:disc !important;}.ambox{background-color:#ffffff !important;border-bottom:1px solid !important;border-right:1px solid !important;border-top:1px solid !important;margin:1em !important;max-width:60% !important;width:auto !important;}.ambox-content{border-color:#f28500 !important;}.ambox-merge{border-color:#9932cc !important;}.ambox-notice{border-color:#1e90ff !important;}.ambox-serious{border-color:#b22222 !important;}.ambox-style{border-color:#f4c430 !important;}.ambox-text{border:none !important;width:auto !important;}table:not(.radius) td.BGorange2 p {white-space: nowrap !important;}.navbox span[style*=\\\"float:\\\"], .navbox div, .navbox div a{font-size:11px !important;}.navbox td.list{padding: 0 0 !important;}.collapsible, .navbox-subgroup{margin: 0em !important;}.collapsible > tbody > tr:first-child th,table.navbox > tbody > tr:first-child th{border: 1px solid #dddddd !important;}.collapsible th,.navbox th,.NavContent th{background-color:#ffffff !important;color:#000000 !important;}.collapsible{margin-left: 0em !important;}.collapsible td{}.collapsible th *,.navbox th *,.NavContent th *,.navbox td{background-color:#ffffff !important;background-color:#ffffff !important;}.collapsible td.navbox-group{background-color:#f8f8f8 !important;}.collapsible table.navbox-subgroup td.navbox-group{background-color:#f8f8f8 !important;}.collapsible td.navbox-list{border-left: 2px solid #ffffff !important;background-color:#f8f8f8 !important;}.collapsible,.NavFrame,.navbox{}.collapsible td.navbox-abovebelow{padding:0 !important;background-color: #dedede !important;}td.navbox-list div:not(.navbar){}table.navbox-columns-table{margin:0 auto !important;width: 100% !important;}table.navbox-columns-table td{padding:0 1em !important;background-color:#f8f8f8 !important;}table.vertical-navbox{margin-left: 1em !important;}.navbox[style*=\\\"float: right\\\"]{margin-left: 1em !important;}table#collapsibleTable0 {margin-left: 0.5em !important;margin-right: 0.5em !important;}#bandeau-portail{margin: 1em 0 1em 0 !important;}.dablink{padding-left:0 !important;}.firstHeading{margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}.gallery{border:none !important;border-collapse:separate !important;margin:15px 0 !important;}.gallery td{background-color:#ffffff !important;}.gallerybox{background-color:transparent !important;border:1px solid #dddddd !important;height:100% !important;}.gallerybox .thumb {margin: 2px !important;}.gallerytext{background-color:transparent !important;padding:15px !important;}.header_notes{background:#ffffff !important;border:1px solid #666666 !important;}.header_notes td:empty{display:none !important;}.headertemplate{background:#666666 !important;border:none !important;margin-bottom:0 !important;}.headertemplate,.headertemplate a{color:#eeeeee !important;}.infobox{float: left !important;margin-right:20px !important;margin-left:-320px !important;background:#ffffff !important;border:1px solid #e8e8e8 !important;border-top: 12px solid #e8e8e8!important;padding:0.5em !important;border-collapse:separate !important;}.infobox *{font-size:12px !important;font-weight:normal !important;}.infobox .infobox{border:none !important;margin: 0 !important;}.infobox .infobox span{font-size: .7em !important;}.infobox .infobox.collapsible {float: none !important;margin-left: auto !important;margin-right: auto !important;}.infobox + p{margin-top:1em !important;}.infobox > tbody > tr > td,.infobox > tbody > tr > th{}.infobox > tbody > tr:not(:first-child) > th:only-child,.infobox > tbody > tr.mergedtoprow:not(:first-child) > td:only-child,.infobox > tbody > tr:not(:first-child) > td:only-child[style*=\\\"background\\\"],.infobox > tbody > tr:not(:first-child) > td:only-child[bgcolor]{border:none !important;border-bottom:1px solid #dddddd !important;color:#000000 !important;font-size:12px !important;padding-top:1em !important;text-align:center !important;}.infobox caption{display:none !important;}.infobox span,.infobox font{}.infobox td.toccolours td,.infobox td.toccolours th{padding:0 !important;}.infobox td:only-child{text-align:center !important;}.infobox th,.infobox td{border:none !important;color:#000000 !important;}.infobox ul{text-align:left !important;}.infobox:not(.sisterproject) > tbody > tr:first-child > td:only-child,.infobox:not(.sisterproject) > tbody > tr:first-child > th:only-child{background:#ffffff !important;font-size:16px !important;font-variant:small-caps !important;padding-bottom:1em !important;text-align:center !important;}.metadata img{background-color:transparent !important;}.infobox-title{display:none !important;font-size:11pt !important;}.page-Main_Page #bodyContent,.page-Wiktionary_Main_Page #bodyContent{margin:0 !important;}.page-Main_Page #p-cactions,.page-Wiktionary_Main_Page #p-cactions{display:none !important;}.references{margin:0 1em 0 0 !important;font-size:10px !important;}.references-small{overflow:hidden !important;font-size:10px !important;}ol.references li {line-height: 1 !important;font-size:10px !important;}div.thumb{margin-top: 2px !important;margin-bottom: 2px !important;padding: 0 0 0 0 !important;}.thumbcaption{margin-top:10px !important;}.thumbcaption .magnify{display:none !important;}.thumbinner,.thumbcaption{background-color:#ffffff !important;border-color:#dddddd !important;color:#000000 !important;font-size:12px !important;margin-left: 0 !important;margin-right: 0px !important;}.tleft{margin-right:2em !important;}.tnone{margin-left:1em !important;margin-right:1em !important;}.tright{margin-left:1em !important;}.toc{background-color:#ffffff !important;border:none !important;font-size:inherit !important;margin:1em 0 !important;padding:0 !important;}.toc td{padding:0 !important;}.wikitable a{}.wikitable b{font-weight:normal !important;}.sortable tr,.wikitable tr{}.wikitable td,.sortable td{border:1px solid #dddddd !important;padding:0.2em !important;}.wikitable th,.sortable th,.sortable tr:first-child td{background:#ffffff !important;border:1px solid #dddddd !important;color:#000000 !important;font-size:14px !important;font-weight:normal !important;text-align:left !important;}.wikitable tr:first-child,.sortable tr:first-child{border-bottom:thick solid #dddddd !important;border-top:thick solid #dddddd !important;}.wikitable,.sortable{border:none !important;border-collapse:collapse !important;-moz-border-bottom-colors:#dddddd #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-left-colors:#dddddd #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-right-colors:#dddddd #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;-moz-border-top-colors:#dddddd #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #ffffff #dddddd !important;padding:1em !important;margin-left:1em !important;margin-right:1em !important;}table .wikitable, table .sortable{margin-left:0em !important;margin-right:0em !important;}#administrator,#protected-icon,.topicon{border:none !important;top:-60px !important;}#anon-banner{display:none !important;}#bodyContent{font-family: Calibri,serif !important; text-align: justify !important;margin:0 0 0 0 !important;padding:0 !important;width:auto !important;margin-left:320px !important;margin-right:320px !important;}#bodyContent > p{text-align:justify !important;}#bodyContent dd,#bodyContent li{margin:0 0 10px 10px !important;}#bodyContent h2{font-family: Georgia,serif !important;font-style: normal !important;font-size: 1.7em !important;border: none !important;}#bodyContent h3{font-size: 1.5em !important;border: none !important;}#bodyContent h4{font-size: 1.4em !important;border: none !important;}#bodyContent h5{font-size: 1.3em !important;border: none !important;}#bodyContent p{line-height:1.5 !important;margin:8px 0 8px !important;font-size: 14.5px !important;}#bodyContent ul,#bodyContent ol,#bodyContent dl{margin: 5px 10px 20px 10px !important;font-size: 14px !important;}#bodyContent ul{list-style-type: square !important;}#bodyContent table.metadata + dl{margin-top: 1em !important;}#bodyContent dl{margin: 0!important;}#bodyContent div.portal {border: 1px solid #dddddd !important;}#catlinks{background:#ffffff !important;border:2px solid #dddddd !important;padding:2px !important;text-align:justify !important;}#column-content{background-color:transparent !important;clear:both !important;float:left !important;margin:0 !important;min-height:100% !important;padding:0 !important;position:relative !important;}#mw-panel{display: none !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav {height: 50px !important;position: absolute !important;top: 0 !important;left: 0 !important;width: 100% !important;background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #efefef !important; padding: 0 !important;display: block !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav h5{font-size:.8em !important;color:black !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav h5:hover{text-decoration:none !important;}#p-navigation h5{display:block!important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav div.portal {background-image: none !important;padding: 0px 0px !important;position: relative !important;z-index: 6 !important;}body:not(.rtl) #mw-panel.collapsible-nav div.portal {margin: 0px 20px 0px 250px !important;float:left !important;}body.rtl #mw-panel.collapsible-nav div.portal {margin: 0px 250px 0px 20px !important;float:right !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav div.portal + div.portal {margin: 0px 20px 0px 0px !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav div.portal h5 {background-image: none !important;margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px 0px 10px 0px !important;text-transform: lowercase !important;display: inline-block !important;border:none !important;font-size: 11.5px !important;margin-top: 16px !important;}#mw-panel.collapsible-nav.collapsible-nav div.portal div.body{display: none !important;position: absolute !important;top: 1.9em !important;background:#f8f8f8 !important;border: 1px solid #dedede !important;padding:5px 10px 5px 10px !important;margin: 0 !important;}body:not(.rtl) #mw-panel.collapsible-nav.collapsible-nav div.portal div.body{left: 0 !important;}body.rtl #mw-panel.collapsible-nav.collapsible-nav div.portal div.body{right: 0 !important;white-space:normal !important;width:100% !important;}body.rtl #column-one{left: 0 !important;right: auto !important;}.portlet *{font-weight:normal !important;text-align:left
